attributes.action: End formal dress code in all places of higher education.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to take more action on eradicating sexism within schools. Dress codes have a damaging effect on young, impressionable girls' self-image as they teach them that their appearance takes priority over their education.
attributes.background: The government should force all schools to prevent punishment of students that are violating the sexist dress code.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government aren't responsible for school or university (higher education) dress codes.  We could accept a petition calling for a ban on the use of school uniform in schools, if that's what you'd like to see happen. Or you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582011
